data.title: Particle Demo test crashes cpp-tests

milestone.title: v3.7
milestone.description:
Current Plan:
- Beta release: June 15th.
- RC0 release: June 25th.
- RC1 release: July 14th.

data.body:
1. Run cpp-tests (reproduced on Win32 build and universal app)
   2, From the main menu go to Node: Particles
2. Tap on the left arrow to get to the Particle Demo test (you should see two Particle Emitters using different texture).
   4.Tap left/right arrow to move to another text - the app crashes

data.title: V3: Fix Windows 10 UWP build by adding missing external/clipper files
data.body: This pull request fixes the Windows 10 UWP build by adding the missing external/clipper files and removing some obsolete files from the solution..

data.title: Clone function of stroke and the shadow is invalid
Use generational gc in SpiderMonkey
data.body:
The background of this feature: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/abhinaba/archive/2009/03/02/back-to-basics-generational-garbage-collection.aspx

This requires to adopt the new GC coding style in all JSB code.

The new GC coding style can be verified with this tool: https://github.com/joshuastray/RootAnalysis

data.title: Some 3d classes can't be constructed with new in JS

milestone.title: v3.8
milestone.description:
This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.body:
Classes that can not be constructed in JS with new:
- [x] PointLight
- [x] SpotLight
- [x] Terrain
- [x] Camera
- [x] Physics3DShape
- [x] Physics3DHingeConstraint
- [x] Physics3DSliderConstraint
- [x] Physics3DConeTwistConstraint
- [x] Physics3D6DofConstraint
- [x] PhysicsSprite3D

Classes that can be constructed with new but not done yet:
- [x] Material
- [x] Animate3D
- [x] Animation3D
- [x] Skybox
- [x] SpritePolygon
- [x] DirectionLight
- [x] AmbientLight
- [x] Physics3DComponent
- [x] Physics3DPointToPointConstraint
- [x] Physics3DRigidBody
- [x] Physics3DWorld

data.title: cocos2d-x 3.6 ListView do not response addEventListener in lua using cocostudio
data.body:
```
for i=1,10 do
```

-- create a csb node
        local event_banner = AnimationNode.load("nodes/home/event_banner.csb")
        event_banner:setTouchEnabled(true)
        local custom_item = ccui.Layout:create()
        custom_item:setContentSize(cc.size( Helpers:getCascadeBoundingBox(event_banner).width, Helpers:getCascadeBoundingBox(event_banner).height))
        event_banner:setPosition(cc.p(custom_item:getContentSize().width / 2.0, custom_item:getContentSize().height / 2.0))
        custom_item:addChild(event_banner)

```
    self.listview:pushBackCustomItem(custom_item)
end

self.listview:onEvent(function(event)
   --------
```

----- not response
        print("((((((logging))))))")
    end)
